private val mancalaIndices = setOf(6, 13)

fun main(args: Array<String>) {
    val permutation = Permutation()
    val caracol = "CARACOL"
    val length = caracol.length
    permutation.findPermutation(caracol, 0, length)
    println(caracol)
    permutation.findPermutation(caracol, 0, length)
}

fun main(args: Array<String>) {
    val uf = WeightedQuickUnionWithPathCompressionUF(10)
    uf.union(4, 3)
    uf.union(3, 8)
    uf.union(6, 5)
    uf.union(9, 4)
    uf.union(2, 1)
    uf.union(5, 0)
    uf.union(7, 2)
    uf.union(6, 1)
    uf.union(7, 3)
}

package com.example

import com.example.FloydWarshall

fun main(args: Array<String>) {
    val matrix = Array(5) { IntArray(5) }
    matrix[0][0] = 0
    matrix[0][1] = 1
    matrix[0][2] = 2
    matrix[0][3] = 3
    matrix[0][4] = 4
    matrix[1][0] = 1
    matrix[1][1] = 1
    matrix[1][2] = 3
    matrix[1][3] = 4
    matrix[1][4] = 5
    matrix[2][0] = 2
    matrix[2][1] = 3
    matrix[2][2] = 2
    matrix[2][3] = 4
    matrix[2][4] = 5
    matrix[3][0] = 3
    matrix[3][1] = 4
    matrix[3][2] = 4
    matrix[3][3] = 3
    matrix[3][4] = 5
    matrix[4][0] = 4
    matrix[4][1] = 5
    matrix[4][2] = 5
    matrix[4][3] = 4
    matrix[4][4] = 3
    FloydWarshall.INSTANCE.doCalcs(matrix)
}
